name: Lee inside TV
description:
In Lee inside TV you have to think outside the box and use the classical mechanics of platformer games to solve puzzles.
- Each level has a new challenge and new mechanics to use.
- Over than 50 levels and some hidden collectibles. It'll be fun!
- Pay attention to the texts with tips in the levels and use them (sometimes literally)
- Nice pixel art graphics and chiptune soundtrack

Story:
Lee is just a regular straw-man boy that is broken and has a room that looks empty and has no style.
To solve this problems he decided to join a TV program called "One Screen Challenge" to make some money and get some nice hidden collectibles.
